definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: The vastness of the lake wide, all ups and downs Island.
sentences.chinese: 宽阔的湖面烟波浩淼，百岛沉浮。

sentences.english: David and Lucy sat in the prow of the fishing boat and looked across the choppy water.
sentences.chinese: 大卫和露西坐在渔船船头，凝望着烟波浩淼的水面。

sentences.english: The Pacific is more desolate than other seas; its spaces seem more vast.
sentences.chinese: 太平洋看来比别的海洋更加荒凉，更加烟波浩渺。

sentences.english: The five lakes tour, the worry everywhere, Floating and sinking through the ages, and who asked the east?
sentences.chinese: 落日五湖游，烟波处处愁。浮沈千古事，谁与问东流？

sentences.english: Like a rainbow, the Seventeen-arch Bridge is captivating, lying on the lake in the mists.
sentences.chinese: 浩淼烟波中，十七孔桥似长虹偃月横卧水面。

sentences.english: Far in the distance lies the Dongting Lake, a vast expanse of misty, rolling waters.
Drum-Spring Thunder broke straight back to Yanbo far.
sentences.chinese: 鼓击春雷，直破烟波远远回。

definition: gleaming reflection of waves in sunlight
deep and somber/see also 窈窈[yao3 yao3]
lit. boat made of lily magnolia wood/poetic term for boat
bright moon/refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark/CL:輪|轮[lun2]
Qingshan district of Wuhan city 武漢市|武汉市[Wu3 han4 shi4], Hubei/Qingshan district of Baotou city 包頭市|包头市[Bao1 tou2 shi4], Inner Mongolia
water and sky merge in one color (idiom)
